text: 👋Hey there! 🤔 Have you ever found yourself struggling to afford medical treatment? 💸💊 It's a problem many of us face, but there's hope! 🌟 TailorMed is working to make healthcare more affordable for everyone. 🎉 Their analytics platform helps patients navigate financial options and get the care they need. 💻👨‍⚕️ But that's not all! TailorMed's Affordability Network is a game-changer, reducing financial toxicity and improving patient experiences. 💪🏼🙌 Srulik Dvorsky, CEO of TailorMed, is leading the charge in healthcare affordability solutions. 💡👨‍⚕️ Check out the latest Healthcare Rethink podcast to learn more! 🎧💬
